title: Building Energy Model
description: Building energy model at the DA level.
subject: gis
building
energy
creator: OGSE workflow engine

title: Energy Intensity Factor Generator
creator: Abu Adnan Abir
description: This atomic model generates an energy intensiti factor considering the current date (year, month, day of week).
subject: bem
gis
energy

state.description: This model holds the current date (day, weekday, month, year) and the calculated factor.

behavior: Constant time advance of one day, increments a day counter, calculates day of week, month, year, etc. and calculates the factor. Requires a valid date as an initialization parameter.

field.name: weekday
field.description: The current day (Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, etc.)

field.name: month
field.description: The current month (January, February, March, etc.)

title: Residential Building Energy Model
creator: Abu Adnan Abir
description: This atomic model generates calculates the energy consumption for a residential building.
subject: bem
gis
energy

state.description: This model holds the current energy consumption considering the date and building type.

behavior: This model reacts to a change in the calendar factor.

gis
energy

state.description: This model holds the current energy consumption considering the date and building type.

behavior: This model reacts to a change in the calendar factor.
